explains: n. 电视广播，电视节目
v. 通过电视广播；转播电视节目

sentences.en: Academy president Sid Ganis told nominees at the Beverly Hilton hotel on Monday to expect some daring tweaks to the telecast.
sentences.cn: 学院院长西德·加尼斯周一在贝弗利希尔顿酒店告诉被提名者们可以期待电视广播做出一些大胆的调整。

sentences.en: The event will be telecast simultaneously to nearly 150 cities.
sentences.cn: 这一盛事将向近150个城市同时进行电视广播。

sentences.en: Did you watch the live telecast of the World Cup last night?
sentences.cn: 昨晚你看世界杯实况赛了吗？
